name: LibraryPlaylists.Attributes
desc: The attributes for a library playlist resource.

items.name: canEdit
items.desc: Indicates whether the playlist can be edited.

items.name: dateAdded
items.desc: The date and time the playlist was added to the userâ€™s library.In YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ ISO 8601 format.

items.name: hasCatalog
items.desc: Indicates whether the playlist has a representation in the Apple Music catalog.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the playlist.

items.name: playParams
items.desc: The parameters to use to play back the tracks in the playlist.
